lines.text: I'm going to burn your kid like a roman candle.
They were watching the black ninja again.
Why do you watch it boys, when your mother tells you not to?

[after killing Sam Green]
Shall we give the old fucker a Viking funeral?

[holding a knife to Limehouse's neck]
Stay away from the Saito family. They don't know anything about the Van Atta neckalace. If you don't, I promise you, you will pray for death.
I'm going to rip your stinking guts out.
You must remove the guilt from your mind, for one day, it will kill you.
Akira, I want you to have this.
No! When I leave Japan, I will put my shadows behind me!
You cannot escape your shadows, my son. You will always be a ninja!
